mapper.select: select * from orderList order by orderNo desc;

select orderList.orderNo, orderList.orderDate, orderList.orderState, orderDetail.itemName, orderDetail.itemAmount, orderDetail.itemPrice, orderDetail.itemNo from orderList inner join ( select orderNo,itemNo, itemName, itemAmount, itemPrice from orderDetail where orderNo in ( select orderNo from orderList where userID = #{userID} ) order by itemPrice desc limit 1 ) as orderDetail on orderList.orderNo = orderDetail.orderNo where userID = #{userID} order by orderList.orderNo desc;
mapper.insert: insert into orderList (userID, delyAddr, userPhone, payment, orderState,receiver) values (#{userID}, #{delyAddr}, #{userPhone}, #{payment} ,#{orderState},#{receiver})
